channel.title: Blue_lights on DESUK: The Duke Ellington Society UK

item.title: 'Canonical Ellington' (accompanying Blue Light 27-2)
item.description: Two Spotify playlists from ‘The Canonical Ellington’, firstly by Gunther Schuller and Martin Williams, and secondly by our own Gareth Evans.

item.title: 'The Mysterious Rabbit' (accompanying Blue Light 26-4)
item.description: A Spotify playlist and details of tracks from ‘The Mysterious Rabbit’.
